og.title: Brink's To Restructure Netherlands Operations

article_metadata.keywords: The Brink's Company, NYSE:BCO, virginia, Restructuring & Recapitalization, Conference Call Announcements, , Banking & Financial Services, High Tech Security

article_summary:
About The Brink's CompanyThe Brink's Company (NYSE: BCO) is the world's premier provider of secure transportation and cash management services.
RICHMOND, Va., Oct. 17, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- The Brink's Company (NYSE: BCO) announced its plan to restructure its Netherlands operations in response to a loss of business with Rabobank, its largest customer in that country.
SOURCE The Brink's Company
For more information, please visit The Brink's Company website at www.Brinks.com or call 804-289-9709.
